definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: At the turn of the Ming and Qing Dynasties, because transportation prosperity brought Liaocheng cultural development.
sentences.chinese: 明清之交，由于漕运兴盛带来了聊城文化事业的发展。

sentences.english: After Ban Gu, Great Han Ode began to decline.
sentences.chinese: 汉大赋的兴盛局面难以为继，开始走向衰败。

sentences.english: The year of Dragon represents good fortune and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 龙年代表着财运和兴盛。

sentences.english: The british empire flourished in the19th century.
sentences.chinese: 大英帝国在19世纪很兴盛。

sentences.english: But I am sure it will be crazy in three or five years.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我肯定三五年之后它会兴盛起来。

sentences.english: Prose was popular during the Warring States Period, mainly as the historical prose.
sentences.chinese: 战国时代的时候散文比较兴盛，主要是一些历史散文。

sentences.english: This section points out the astrology flourished during the Han Dynasty various social causes.
sentences.chinese: 这一部分分析了星占学在汉代兴盛的各种社会原因。

sentences.english: Hawaii is famous for its thriving tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷以其繁荣兴盛的观光业闻名。

sentences.english: Pianlipai was a tradition opera that bring about prosperity in the middle and end of Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 骈俪派是兴盛于明代中后期的一个戏曲流派。

sentences.english: Toby has spent his life comparing the way cililiza- tions rise and fall.
sentences.chinese: 托比一生都在比较各种文明是怎样兴盛衰亡的。

sentences.english: The flourish of poems of love is a special phenomenon of literature in the circle of poets of the late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 爱情诗的兴盛是中晚唐诗坛一个引人注目的文学现象。

sentences.english: During his life time the Tang Dynasty was in decay .
sentences.chinese: 杜甫生活得年代，唐朝已经由兴盛走向衰败。

sentences.english: Starting from the middle of Ming Dynasty, porcelain painting was into a prosperous development.
sentences.chinese: 从清中期开始，瓷板画的发展走向了兴盛。

sentences.english: The foundry industry of bronze mirror was therefore very thriving.
sentences.chinese: 铜镜的铸造业因此十分兴盛。

sentences.english: Their prosperity and their fatness mean the impoverishment of the country.
sentences.chinese: 它们的兴盛和肥壮正是地方的贫瘠。

definition: to fall/to drop/to decline/to deteriorate/to go downhill
to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
all the rage for a time/grand fashion for a limited time
to decline/to die out/decline and fall
